bannerText: Don't know what you need? Maybe a quick read!
pageText: Gain valuable insights from interviews conducted by our Chronicle team of college students.

articles.title: Everyone Is Different
articles.description: Everyone has different approaches, personalities, concerns, and worries.

articles.title: Go Ahead And Ask
articles.description: You'll be surprised at what you get if you just ask.

articles.title: If You Want to Fail, Fail Early
articles.description: If we need to pivot to a different solution then so be it. If you're not taking risks, you're also not going to innovate.

articles.title: Remind Yourself Your Initial Motivation
articles.description: Regardless of how many kinds of challenges happen down the road, you can remind yourself - your initial motivation.

articles.title: Become the Strongest Person
articles.description: When you empower other people and allow them to empower you, you become the strongest person.

articles.title: Communication Is Key
articles.description: Education is necessary to learn the technical points, but soft skills are vital to your success.

articles.title: Certification Helps
articles.description: Certification helps for concrete skills, and also helps for landing your first or second job.

articles.title: The Biggest Happiness
articles.description: It is when you get to help others in a way where you would have never thought you could help.

articles.title: Do Something You Like
articles.description: As your career extends, the pay isn't going to be the major motivation, but really the fulfillment.

articles.title: You Can Do This
articles.description: Sometimes we have to have that person in our life that says you can do this and encourages us.

articles.title: Psychology is my Calling
articles.description: Psychology remains a popular program and can help students to discover more about themselves and how to be happier.

articles.title: Internships are Opportunities
articles.description: Expose yourself to actual classes and do hands-on learning before you can decide whether that's something that you want to go for.

articles.title: Explore the Real World
articles.description: Study hard to build a solid foundation of knowledge and good habits of learning. Exercising regularly is also important.

articles.title: Good Technology is for Helping People
articles.description: Not only do we need to understand the technology, but also how this technology is useful for our potential clients.

articles.title: Constant Exposure Leads to Right Direction
articles.description: "I am glad that constant exposure to the inspiration of research helped to overcome my doubt and pointed me in the direction I should go."

articles.title: Stem Students â‰  "Nerds"
articles.description: Life is VERY hard to predict. You just have to follow your passion, become your best self, and when opportunities knock, be ready.
